name: DISHA GRAMIN VIKAS MANCH
briefDescription: Mr Manoj Kumar Pandey, an enterprising and inspiring individual, full with devotion towards society and love for community cherishes his endeavors creating meaning for common and needy people in rural India leads Disha Gramin Vikash Manch as the promoter and Secretary. This school going kid in 1975 took active part in J.P. movement and went to Jail. He learnt team work through his representation in Junior Bihar team in Inter-state cricket tournament and national Integration camp of 1988 at Punjab. He Lead many youth and community development camps and travelled almost all over India in a Cultural Harmony travel.
